name: BreakOut 3D
description:
A variation on the classic Breakout theme created at Unity to complete one of the course assignments. Beat the shuriken platform with a ninja to destroy various objects. Some of them increase shuriken, some reduce, and some create copies of it. The flight path can be traced using the "trace" remaining behind the shuriken. Gravity and Japanese atmsofer are included. 

To start shuriken, click the left mouse button.
